name: Space Escape (derf6060)
description:
Synopsis

"You just woke up from a meteor hitting your space ship. You survived some how, however, you must find an escape pod to return home. But there is danger. Parts of your ship, Oxygen and Fuel Reserve or simply leaving the wreckage will spell doom for you. Will you survive?"

Controls:

Left Key: Rotate Left

Right Key Rotate Right

Z Key: Turn on thrusters

Disclaimer:

This game was created for Trijam #153. The theme was "Empty World." It seemed like the void of space could match the theme I guess plus I wanted to play around with the camera a bit. The time it took me to complete this game was 04:29:29 which I'm not to proud of.  Well hopefully you'll enjoy this little game.
